DENY_0.message: I'm sorry, but I don't think I can trust you with this delivery.

DENY_2.message: Eu não acho que você seja o piloto que estou procurando.

DENY_3.message: You don't look like someone I can trust with this delivery.

DENY_4.message: Você não é o tipo de piloto que estou procurando.

DENY_5.message: You seem much too inexperienced to handle a task of this importance.

DENY_6.message: I have never heard of you. I need someone experienced for this delivery.

DENY_7.message: I'm not willing to risk this delivery on someone without any qualifications like you.

EXCELLENT_I_WILL_LET_THE_RECIPIENT_KNOW_.message: Excellent. I will let the recipient know you are on your way.

FLAVOUR_0_ADTEXT.message: Going to the {system} system? Money paid for delivery of a small package.

FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG.message: Unacceptable! You took forever over that delivery. I'm not willing to pay you.

FLAVOUR_0_INTROTEXT.message: Hi, I'm {name}. I'll pay you {cash} if you will deliver a small package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_0_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the delivery. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_0_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: When a friend visited me she left behind some clothes and antique paper books. I'd like to have them returned to her.

FLAVOUR_1_ADTEXT.message: Wanted: Delivery of a package to the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_1_FAILUREMSG.message: I'm frustrated by the late delivery of my package, and I refuse to pay you.

FLAVOUR_1_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry a package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_1_SUCCESSMSG.message: The package has been received and you have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_2_ADTEXT.message: Urgent! Fast ship needed to deliver a package to the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_2_FAILUREMSG.message: I was quite clear about the deadline and am very disappointed by the late delivery. You will not be paid.

FLAVOUR_2_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry a package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_2_SUCCESSMSG.message: You have been paid in full for the delivery. Thank you.

FLAVOUR_2_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: It is a research proposal and must be delivered by the deadline or we may not get funding.

FLAVOUR_3_ADTEXT.message: Delivery of sensitive documents to the {system} system. {cash} to an experienced pilot.

FLAVOUR_3_FAILUREMSG.message: Useless! I will never depend on you again! Needless to say, you will not be paid for this.

FLAVOUR_3_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. I'm {name}. I'm willing to pay {cash} for a ship to carry a package to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_3_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your timely and discreet service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_3_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: Some extremely sensitive documents have fallen into my hands, and I have reason to believe that the leak has been traced to me.

FLAVOUR_4_ADTEXT.message: Interstellar Postal Services. We require a ship for the delivery run to {system} system.

FLAVOUR_4_FAILUREMSG.message: Your ship registration has been noted, we will reject all further applications for work from you.

FLAVOUR_4_INTROTEXT.message: Greetings. This is an automated message from Bedford and {name} Courier Services. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

FLAVOUR_4_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your timely and discreet service is much appreciated. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_4_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: Ficaríamos contentes se pagássemos menos dinheiro.

FLAVOUR_5_ADTEXT.message: Transport belongings to {starport} from port storage facility.

FLAVOUR_5_FAILUREMSG.message: What are these? Oh, you took so long that I forgot I'd even sent this!

FLAVOUR_5_INTROTEXT.message: Nice to meet you. I am {name} and I'm willing to pay {cash} for someone with a ship to help me move my belongings to {starport}. No rush, they are just some leftovers from moving house.

FLAVOUR_5_SUCCESSMSG.message: Oh wonderful. I'll start unloading immediately. Thanks again.

FLAVOUR_5_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: É demasiado? Tenho de repensar a minha oferta!

FLAVOUR_6_ADTEXT.message: In-system courier services required. Delivery of a small package to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_6_FAILUREMSG.message: I could have delivered it faster myself. I'm not paying you.

FLAVOUR_6_INTROTEXT.message: Hi. I'm {name} and I will pay {cash} for a ship to deliver this package to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_6_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the package, you have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_7_ADTEXT.message: Standardized inter-planetary transport contract. Freight of local cargo to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_7_FAILUREMSG.message: Our customers are not going to be happy with this. Do not expect to be paid.

FLAVOUR_7_INTROTEXT.message: Hello. We need these crates delivered to {starport} as soon as possible. Standard payment for this shipment is {cash}.

FLAVOUR_7_SUCCESSMSG.message: Excellent, we've credited the funds into your account.

FLAVOUR_7_WHYSOMUCHTEXT.message: Taxas normais, trabalhamos com o mercado.

FLAVOUR_8_ADTEXT.message: Urgent personal delivery contract. Require quick delivery of an item to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_8_FAILUREMSG.message: You were offered a premium for quick delivery! I refuse to pay for this.

FLAVOUR_8_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name} and I need this item delivered to a friend at {starport} pronto, I'll pay you {cash} credits if you get it there in a reasonable time.

FLAVOUR_8_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your prompt delivery is appreciated, I have credited your account accordingly.

FLAVOUR_9_ADTEXT.message: Package drop-off required. Urgent dispatch of perishables to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_9_FAILUREMSG.message: It's all spoilt, this is of no use to anyone! We cannot and will not pay you.

FLAVOUR_9_INTROTEXT.message: Greetings, we're behind with our produce shipment and need it delivered to {starport} urgently. We'll pay you {cash} for your troubles.

FLAVOUR_9_SUCCESSMSG.message: Grand! We'll start unpacking immediately. I'll have your account updated right away.

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DELIVERED.message: Quão cedo tem de ser entregue?

IT_COULD_BE_DANGEROUS_YOU_SHOULD_MAKE_SU.message: It could be dangerous, you should make sure you're adequately prepared.

IT_MUST_BE_DELIVERED_BY.message: A entrega tem de ser feita antes de

PIRATE_TAUNTS_1.message: Parece que o meu cheque chegou!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_2.message: You're working for {client}? That was a bad idea.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_3.message: Your cargo and your life, pilot!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_4.message: I'm sure this will bring a pretty penny on the market

PIRATE_TAUNTS_5.message: Hoje não é o teu dia da sorte! Prepara-te para morrer.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_6.message: Tell my old friend {client} that I'll see them in hell!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_7.message: Desta vez essa encomenda não irá chegar ao destino.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_9.message: You'll pay for that cargo, with your life.

THIS_IS_A_VALUABLE_PACKAGE_YOU_SHOULD_KE.message: This is a valuable package, you should keep your eyes open.

THIS_IS_VERY_RISKY_YOU_WILL_ALMOST_CERTA.message: This is very risky, you will almost certainly run into resistance.
